name: Death by Growth
description:
Build a town, pay your tribute, don’t let things get out of control!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 49. 

The Game Jam's theme was: 

Unstable.

*      *      *

Created by:

Luis León (@lleon_779) — Design & UI

Santiago Zamarripa (@kaijizuma) — Design & Art

Iván Carballar (@Icarbas) — Code & Design

Rafael Jiménez (@el_rafilla) — Music
